title: RP code
body: please can someone give me a free RP code i will thanks a lot

replies.body: Hmm, not something we have handy to offer.  :/  Is there something you're specifically trying to get?  You can grab some free stuff through [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) crafting, though!  You can get mastery chests and key fragments as you play, and roll some sweet skins.  :D
i got so many chest but no key
